data.text: @ElvenesTor Thanks - the originator of comparing Twitter to a pub was Duncan Jones @ManMadeMoon, who was very kind to me when I had asked permission to use one of his dad's photos. I was new to Twitter and Duncan was so gracious and kind, I stayed. He is a fun person to follow.
@ElvenesTor Married in 1966, a long time indeed

@Norska11 Exactly, my parents use FB to keep up with family and friends too.
Me as well.
Calling twitter an International pub was a very good comparison. 
Just misses the beer!😂🤩

@OEimhear Very nice pictures of them!
They seem to be very happy.
Some years between the first and last photo.....😀
Mine have been married for 54 years. 
Long time.

@OEimhear Good morning and thank you, Eimhear😊😀
Yes, the same here. The vaccination system was very well organised here too.
A lot of people did a great job!
One of the big advantages for us who lives in good democracies.
My best wishes for both you and your parents weekend😀😀😊😊🤩🤩

@petiehenry Thank you, Peter!
We are too.😀😊
@ElvenesTor So very glad to hear they are both ok🙏🏼🥂

@ElvenesTor Same with mine, age 88  & 78 they were triple vaccinated so only got mild symptoms. The Irish vaccine rollout, once it started, was excellent & incredibly well organised. Iâ€™ve many complaints about our government, especially about housing & healthcare, but they vaccinated us well https://t.co/IHLF152lIV
